trans-unit.source: Sets the identity of the user for an ASP.NET application when forms authentication is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 启用窗体身份验证后，请设置为 ASP.NET 应用程序的用户的标识。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The FormsAuthenticationModule sets the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object that represents the user identity for the current request when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> in the [authentication Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) element of the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: FormsAuthenticationModule 设置当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>对象，表示当前的用户标识请求时身份验证<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>设置为<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>中[身份验证元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2)应用程序的配置文件元素。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The FormsAuthenticationModule exposes an <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event that enables you to provide a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: FormsAuthenticationModule 公开<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>，使您可以提供自定义<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal><xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性的当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext></xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>对象</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>的事件</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is accessed by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>事件可通过指定一个名为子例程**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In IIS 7.0, using the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> with the FormsAuthenticationModule is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 在 IIS 7.0 中，使用<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>不支持 with FormsAuthenticationModule。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated modes, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关在集成模式下的兼容性问题的详细信息，请参阅[从 IIS 6.0 的 ASP.NET 应用程序迁移到 IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数不应从应用程序代码中调用。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 调用此构造函数来创建实例的<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>类。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: After calling the constructor, it calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A> method to initialize the new <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> object.
trans-unit.target: 后调用的构造函数，它调用<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>方法以初始化新<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>对象。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application authenticates the current request.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序进行身份验证当前的请求时发生。

trans-unit.source: The Authenticate event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证事件期间引发<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the Authenticate event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理的身份验证事件的<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>类通过指定一个名为子例程**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs><xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs><xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>属性提供给**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件设置<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>属性的当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>向自定义<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>对象。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>期间属性**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**使用事件、 窗体身份验证票证的 cookie 或 URL 中提供的标识。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication mode is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> in the [authentication Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) element of the application's configuration file and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**身份验证模式设置为时才引发事件<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>中[身份验证元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2)应用程序的配置文件元素和<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>是应用程序的活动 HTTP 模块。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources, other than memory, used by the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 释放所有资源，以外使用的内存<xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不应从应用程序代码中调用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不应从应用程序代码中调用。

trans-unit.source: The Init method ensures that the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is included in the processing of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> and <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> events.
trans-unit.target: Init 方法可确保<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>包含在处理<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>和<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前<xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref>实例。
